item.title: Installing Update Rollup (UR) 3 for System Center 2012 R2 Virtual Machine Manager
item.description: Update rollup (UR) 3 for System Center 2012 R2 Virtual Machine Manager is released this week. This update includes a Linux guest agent upgrade to support the following new operating systems: Ubuntu Linux 14.04 (32-bit) Ubuntu Linux 14.04 (64-bit) This update also includes the following: Host DHCP extension driver upgrade Several performance improvements?
